notices.title: Winter Vacation Notice
notices.content: School will remain closed from December 25, 2025 to January 5, 2026 for winter vacation. Classes will resume on January 6, 2026.

notices.title: Annual Sports Day
notices.content: Annual Sports Day will be held on December 15, 2025. All students are requested to participate actively. Parents are cordially invited.

notices.title: Monthly Test Schedule
notices.content: Monthly tests for November will be conducted from November 20-25, 2025. Students should prepare accordingly.

notices.title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
notices.content: Parent-Teacher meeting is scheduled for November 30, 2025 at 10:00 AM. All parents are requested to attend.
